name: Looking For That GameZoid
description:
You, an alien child, had your precious GameZoid confiscated by your mom, who has created an elaborate treasure hunt for you to find it... can reclaim your GameZoid without being caught?

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim and left mouse to interact
  • ALT + F4 to quit
  • ALT + Enter to toggle full screen
Special Mechanics:
  • Clicking on enemies will stun them momentarily
  • Your movement speed is randomized each new room entered
  • If you get caught, you lose a key!
